articles.description: Oleksandr Usyk and Tyson Fury are scheduled to meet in a rematch on 21 December, the chairman of Saudi Arabia's general entertainment authority says.
articles.title: Tyson Fury vs Oleksandr Usyk rematch on 21 December says Saudi official

articles.description: The latest manager news with Kieran McKenna expected to sign a new contract as Ipswich Town manager, the latest on Enzo Maresca's potential move to Chelsea, plus transfer latest and build-up to Europa Conference League final.
articles.title: Manager latest, football news and transfer gossip, plus build-up to Europa Conference League final

articles.description: Australia spinner Nathan Lyon says he is "surprised" James Anderson is retiring from Test cricket because he would still be England’s "best bowler".
articles.title: Nathan Lyon 'surprised' by James Anderson England retirement

articles.description: Real Madrid and England midfielder Jude Bellingham is voted La Liga's Player of the Season in his first year in Spain.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: Real Madrid & England midfielder win La Liga award

articles.description: He was widely panned as the worst umpire in the game. But was the criticism fair?
articles.title: Angel Hernández: Much-vilified MLB umpire calls it quits

articles.description: American player Danielle Collins has enjoyed one of the finest seasons of her career. In her first BBC Sport column, she explains why she is retiring.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Danielle Collins on retirement, endometriosis and wanting a normal life

articles.description: There are few sportspeople who describe their choice of discipline as “absolutely stupid” – but Martin Perry is not like most athletes.
articles.title: Martin Perry: 'Playing table tennis with no hands is stupid - but I love it'

articles.description: The Minnesota Timberwolves claim a crucial 105-100 win against the Dallas Mavericks to stay in contention for a place in the NBA Finals.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Timberwolves hit back in Finals series with Mavericks

articles.title: Champions League Final: Jude Bellingham a 'Real Madrid legend in the making'
